abstract.t: This document presents an object-oriented model of low-level IPsecpolicy designed to:o facilitate agreement about the content and semantics of IPsecpolicyo enable derivations of task-specific representations of IPsecpolicy such as storage schema, distribution representations,and policy specification languages used to configure IPsec-enabled endpointsThe schema described in this document models the IKE phase oneparameters as described in [1] and the IKE phase two parameters forthe IPsec Domain of Interpretation as described in [2, 3, 4, 5].
